content:
Hi all, just wondering if anyone could check in on this PR #16120 (rows, columns and transposes of Young diagrams). As of a bit more than a week ago, it's just about finished.

The remaining thing is: I have a draft of a simp set to prove statements about columns of μ : young_diagram by reducing them to statements about rows of μ.transpose. The simp set works OK but I'm not sure it's worth the extra hassle. Should I post a draft here? Or add it to the PR even though it may not be worth it?
